    SmtpEndpoint

    public class SocketEndpoint
extends Endpoint
    An endpoint to an HTTP address.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SocketEndpoint.BinaryRequest
      A socket communication method implementation that sends binary data to an endpoint socket and optionally receives a response.
      static class  SocketEndpoint.SocketRequest<I,O>
      A generic base class for socket communication method that sends data to an endpoint socket and optionally receives a response.
      static class  SocketEndpoint.TextRequest
      A socket communication method implementation that sends text data to an endpoint socket and optionally receives a response.

      • binaryRequest

        public static SocketEndpoint.BinaryRequest binaryRequest(byte[] rDefaultCommand,
                                                         de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<java.io.InputStream,java.lang.Integer> fGetResponseSize)
        Factory method that creates a new socket request for binary communication.
        Parameters:
        rDefaultCommand - The default command string to send to the endpoint
        fGetResponseSize - A function that determines the response size to be read from the endpoint socket after sending the command string or NULL if no response needs to be read
        Returns:
        The command function

      • textRequest

        public static SocketEndpoint.TextRequest textRequest(java.lang.String sDefaultCommand,
                                                     de.esoco.lib.expression.Function<java.io.Reader,java.lang.Integer> fGetResponseSize)
        Factory method that creates a new socket request for text-based communication.
        Parameters:
        sDefaultCommand - The default command string to send to the endpoint
        fGetResponseSize - A function that determines the response size to be read from the endpoint socket after sending the command string or NULL if no response needs to be read
        Returns:
        The command function

      • url

        public static java.lang.String url(java.lang.String sHost,
                                   int nPort,
                                   boolean bEncrypted)
        Builds a socket endpoint URL from the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        sHost - The host name or address
        nPort - The port to connect to
        bEncrypted - TRUE for an encrypted connection
        Returns:
        The resulting endpoint URL

      • closeConnection

        protected void closeConnection(Connection rConnection)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Closes any resources that have been acquired on initializing the given connection. Any exception thrown by this method will be converted into a CommunicationException.
        Specified by:
        closeConnection in class Endpoint
        Parameters:
        rConnection - The connection to close
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Returns:
        The endpoint socket

      • initConnection

        protected void initConnection(Connection rConnection)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Must be implemented to initialize any resources that are needed to use the given connection. Any exception thrown by this method will be converted into a CommunicationException.
        Specified by:
        initConnection in class Endpoint
        Parameters:
        rConnection - The connection to initialize
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
